mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EAT_INFO ( EAT_SEQ_NO, TITLE, EAT_CONTENTS, REG_DT, CHG_DT, USER_ID )VALUES ( EAT_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{eatContents}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{userId} )

INSERT INTO FILE_INFO ( FILE_SEQ, BRD_SEQ_NO, USER_NO, ORI_NAME, CHG_NAME, FILE_SIZE, FILE_PATH, EXTENSION, REG_DT, BRD_KIND ) VALUES ( FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, (SELECT MAX(EAT_SEQ_NO) FROM EAT_INFO), #{userNo}, #{oriName}, #{chgName}, #{fileSize}, #{filePath}, #{extension}, SYSDATE, #{brdKind} )
mapper.select: SELECT B.RN, B.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT EI.EAT_SEQ_NO as eatSeqNo, EI.TITLE as title, EI.EAT_CONTENTS as eatContents, EI.REG_DT as regDt, EI.CHG_DT as chgDt, EI.USER_ID as userId, UI.USER_NAME as userName FROM ( SELECT EI2.* FROM EAT_INFO EI2 ) EI INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON UI.USER_ID = EI.USER_ID WHERE EI.TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR EI.EAT_SEQ_NO LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR UI.USER_NAME LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' ORDER BY EI.EAT_SEQ_NO DESC ) A ) B WHERE B.RN BETWEEN (( #{page_num}-1) * #{page_count} + 1 ) AND ( #{page_num} * #{page_count} )

SELECT EI.EAT_SEQ_NO as eatSeqNo, EI.TITLE as title, EI.EAT_CONTENTS as eatContents, EI.REG_DT as regDt, EI.CHG_DT as chgDt, EI.USER_ID as userId, UI.USER_NAME as userName, FI.CHG_NAME as chgName, FI.FILE_SEQ as fileSeq FROM EAT_INFO EI LEFT JOIN ( SELECT BRD_KIND, CHG_NAME, FILE_SEQ, BRD_SEQ_NO FROM FILE_INFO WHERE BRD_KIND = 'eat' )FI ON EI.EAT_SEQ_NO = FI.BRD_SEQ_NO INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON EI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID WHERE EI.EAT_SEQ_NO = #{eatSeqNo}

SELECT EI.EAT_SEQ_NO as eatSeqNo, EI.TITLE as title, EI.EAT_CONTENTS as eatContents, EI.REG_DT as regDt, EI.CHG_DT as chgDt, EI.USER_ID as userId, UI.USER_NAME as userName FROM EAT_INFO EI INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON EI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID WHERE EI.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT COUNT(0) AS CNT FROM EAT_INFO EI INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON EI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID WHERE EI.TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR EI.EAT_SEQ_NO LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR UI.USER_NAME LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR EI.CHG_DT LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
mapper.update: UPDATE FILE_INFO SET CHG_NAME = #{chgName}, ORI_NAME = #{oriName}, FILE_SIZE = #{fileSize}, FILE_PATH = #{filePath}, EXTENSION = #{extension} WHERE FILE_SEQ = #{fileSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT EI.EAT_SEQ_NO as eatSeqNo, EI.TITLE as title, EI.EAT_CONTENTS as eatContents, EI.REG_DT as regDt, EI.CHG_DT as chgDt, EI.USER_ID as userId, UI.USER_NAME as userName FROM EAT_INFO EI, USER_INFO UI WHERE EI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID AND EI.TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR EI.EAT_SEQ_NO LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR UI.USER_NAME LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR EI.CHG_DT LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
